structured_data.overview: This content provides environmental CEQA (California Environmental Quality Act) information for the City of El Segundo, including cumulative projects, transportation impact analysis resources, and General Plan Environmental Impact Reports.

documents.title: CUMULATIVE PROJECTS
documents.description: List of major proposed or approved but not completed projects within the City of El Segundo

documents.title: SB 743 Implementation Guidelines (VMT Policy)
documents.description: The City's policy that establishes Vehicle Miles Travelled (VMT) as the metric for evaluating the transportation impact of development projects

documents.title: Draft EIR Appendices (Volume 2)
documents.description: General Plan Environmental Impact Report Appendices (1991)

documents.title: Final EIR
documents.description: Final General Plan Environmental Impact Report (1991)

structured_data.other_info: The city provides a TredLite Transportation Impact Analysis Tool (https://tredlite.kimley-horn.com/sites/elsegundo/) for conducting transportation impact analysis pursuant to the City's VMT Policy. For Environmental/CEQA information for specific projects, residents can visit the Approved Projects page at https://www.elsegundo.org/government/departments/community-development/planning-division/active-projects#!/.
